description: Cumulative patch through roundN_plus92: adds 2.5D isometric doorway frames for open doors (procedural spritegen + renderer integration) and associated isometric shadowing.
summary: Add a new procedural sprite generator for isometric 2.5D open-door doorway frames (square sprite with stone faces + passable opening shading).
Generate and cache open-door frame variants lazily alongside other isometric terrain assets (doorBlockOpenVarIso).
Render DoorOpen tiles using the new 2.5D doorway frames in ViewMode::Isometric (and include them as occluders/shadow casters for better depth cues).
notes: Open doors are passable but still represent architectural wall openings; in isometric view they now render as a 2.5D doorway frame so the map reads with more vertical depth.
When doorway frames are available, the renderer suppresses the flat projected floor overlay for DoorOpen to avoid visual clutter/double-drawing.
